snippet.title: Beetle Ju 3 | Beetle Bug 3 - PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
In the third entry in the main series, Ju goes to the store at the request of his wife. He is already at the store’s cash desk while his wife calls him and reports, that all their children have been kidnapped. He and his 2 remaining children, are going to save all children.

Compared to Beetle Ju & Beetle Ju 2 your goal is to retrieve all children from the all 100 levels in this game.

Beetle Bug 3 / Beetle Ju 3 (C) gamigo AG
Also on J2ME

#beelteju #beetlebug #beetleju3 #beetlebug3 #intenum #windows #casualgames

FUN FACT: There was a lesser-known mobile port of this game made for the Java-based phones. Since this was at a time before Apple released their first iPhone, playing games on your phone was uncommon. It is a pretty forgotten game, as is often the case with *many* J2ME games made by companies other than Gameloft... though I will say, it was way better than the toxic dump that is the MODERN smartphone game landscape on Apple App Store and Google Play, with fake, misleading ads, aggressive monetization and pestering people for cash every moment, the shovelware overload, possible malware being hidden in plain sight et all.
